duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the configuration of finish goods to be supplied to shipping based on customer demand.
Perform assembly process for configured devices based on guidance from standard work instructions.
Perform transactions at the time of inventory movement to ensure accurate inventory management.
Effectively communicate within own team and to other teams within the site.
Safely operate production tools and material handling equipment as needed.
Strive to reach production goals each day.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or (GED) General Education Degree
